558980.name: Abduction Demo
558980.description:
What is Abduction?

About the Prologue:


Abduction Prologue is our first mini-episode (about 10 minutes to play) based on the story of Jonathan Blake. It serves as a demo for the rest of the series, and is a free playable early episode for the series!

Waking up in the middle of the night, you realize you’re not alone. Armed with your wits, you need to make it through your apartment and find a way to survive the ABDUCTION.

Genre:

  • Horror
  • Survival

History of Abduction


Since the dawn of time, humans have been the subject of horrific experiments and abductions. The creatures that take us in the night have the innate ability to paralyze our bodies, or minds, and erase our memories … until now.

In this survival horror-meets-puzzle game, you play as a series of characters at different moments in their lives. Watch as their lives transform, and they begin to build up a resistance to the abilities of the creatures… and take back control of their very lives.

Supported Hardware:

  • OSVR
  • Oculus (through OSVR)
  • HTC Vive
  • Non-VR (using a Gamepad or Keyboard and Mouse)
558980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
